event.title: foss-north 2016 in Gothenburg, Sweden
event.body: The foss-north conference is a software and hardware related event with a technical perspective, hosted in Gothenburg and providing a meeting place for Nordic foss communities to come together. The FSFE's vice president, Alessandro Rubini, will participate and present a talk on Time in Software and Hardware - how time is handled in the Linux kernel and in the White Rabbit network at CERN, and FSFE's Executive Director, Jonas Ã–berg, will present a talk about the State of Free Software in Europe (and elsewhere).
